website_summaries.verdict: Roomy interior, durable build, and assembly that's a snap put this swimming pool at the top of our shortlist.
pros: Large enough for a family or a group of friends, and offers a water capacity of 6,056 litres
Strong metal frame is easy to put together and doesn't require tools to complete the task
cons: Filter requires a UK adapter for the plug, but purchasing one is a small added expense

customer_reviews.title: Has a European plug
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE it has a EUROPEAN PLUG. So you can get the pool erected but that is it. No instructions on what or how much chlorine to use. a lot of head scratching and googling still not much the wiser have had an additional fortune on various bit to go with it. Spend more money or wait a while and get a different pool. 2 very disappointed kids who have a full pool with no working pump and no idea of how much chemicals to put in. Not to mention a day wasted trying to work it all out. Very very very unhappy
customer_reviews.author: kat10

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: This took me an hour to put up on my own, dead easy as long as you follow the instructions. Took all afternoon to fill up - but we have very low water pressure where I live. It's big enough to get 2 or three strokes in and for two lilos to bob around on it. Very good quality no scratches or nicks anywhere - and certainly no leaks - beyond pleased had great fun in this as it's deep enough to snorkle as a laugh. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Great pool. Enough room for inflatables.Very easy to assemble. My 13 year old did it by himself. Would recommend a solar cover , keeps pool clean and warms it up a few degrees. Really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plug is not a UK Fitting and pump is nowhere near big enough
customer_reviews.text: Pool itself is fine so far, easy to put up etc but can't plug the pump in due to US fitting, and from past experience with these pools the supplied pump is nowhere near powerful enough to move this amount of water.
customer_reviews.author: Mr a c white

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: So far so good no leaks etc done us well over the really hot period 5 hours to fill, 24 to empty via hose.... does need to be on a near perfect level but that’s to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Best fun we have had all summer !!
customer_reviews.text: Fantasic pool !!! So far in the 4 days I've had it ive had two adults, two 16 , one 14, two 5 , one 12 and one 2 year old in it almost constantly and two 14 and one 13 year old popping around for a dip. Well worth the money . Only wish I had bought the pool chemicals and the ground sheet before hand (but they are on their way) and the filter pump isn't that strong .
customer_reviews.author: michelle pasco

customer_reviews.title: Pool
customer_reviews.text: Lovely pool,great size for my large family. A little tip though if considering buying this product please note that when emptying you will need to take the back let’s off and tip it up or the last of the water has no way to get out!
customer_reviews.author: miss c  gray

customer_reviews.title: Money down the drain with the water running out of it......
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pool a couple of months sgo but due to weather where i live being awful i have only just put it up... water pouring out of it.. £198 down the drain... LITERALLY... DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: ann k

customer_reviews.title: Great pool
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, have used nearly everyday since it arrived. Good quality, very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the pool
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality going to have lots of fun with this
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Best paddling pool on the market
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put up, will not be buying a blow up pool again. Recommend buying the ladder to go with it. Kids love this pool, ready for the perfect staycation
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Jenner

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant family absolutely love it & easy to set up!!!
customer_reviews.author: BCC

product_meta.title: DKM Trade Summer Waves Frame Swimming Pool with Pump 12 feet x 30 inch 366 x 76 cm

Metal frame
